text: Christy's dormouse (Graphiurus christyi) is a species of rodent in the Gliridae family. It is found in Cameroon and Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==References== * Grubb, P. & Schlitter, D. 2008. Graphiurus christyi . 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 18 August 2009. *Holden, M. E.. 2005. Family Gliridae. Pp. 819-841 in Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore. Category:Graphiurus
title: Christy's dormouse
